recipe_name: Lamb cutlets with garlic and rosemary
author: Elizabeth Guy
method: Preheat a barbecue to hot.  Combine the olive oil, garlic and rosemary in a small bowl. Stir well and brush the chops with the flavoured oil on both sides. Cook for about three minutes on each side - the meat should still be slightly pink on the inside.
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,  3 garlic cloves,  2 springs rosemary, finely chopped,  4 lamb chops
